title: Update Budget for Material Price Increase
description: A supplier has announced a 10% price increase for lumber. The PM must update the project budget to reflect this.

tasks.description: Identify the remaining amount of lumber to be purchased from the project takeoff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines that $100,000 worth of lumber still needs to be ordered.

tasks.description: Calculate the new forecasted cost for the lumber line item, including the 10% increase.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new forecasted cost is calculated as $110,000.

tasks.description: Update the 'Lumber' line item in the project budget with the new forecast.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project budget is successfully updated.
